name: ReorderErrorTrackingRules
description:
Reorder error tracking grouping rules in a project.

Use this tool to change the order of error tracking grouping rules within a specified project environment. Useful for prioritizing or restructuring how errors are grouped.

parameters.name: project_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the project you wish to access. Obtainable via the /api/projects/ endpoint.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: error_tracking_rule_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the error tracking rule you want to reorder.

parameters.name: error_grouping_filters
parameters.description: Filters to apply for selecting specific error tracking rules to reorder. This can include criteria like rule severity, type, etc.

parameters.name: rule_assignee
parameters.description: Assign a person or role responsible for the error tracking grouping rule. Expected to be a string representing a user's name or identifier.

parameters.name: new_order_key
parameters.description: An integer representing the new order position for the error tracking grouping rules.

parameters.name: disabled_data_details
parameters.description: Specify details of the data to disable or modify. Format as a string describing which elements are affected.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
